metadata.title: CVE-2020-21677 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: A heap-based buffer overflow in the sixel_encoder_output_without_macrofunction in encoder.c of Libsixel 1.8.4 allows attackers to cause a denialof service (DOS) via converting a crafted PNG file into Sixel format.

criterions.comment: libsixel package in esm-apps/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
